title: HTML Images
description: Learn how to embed images using the tag with src and alt attributes.

examples.output: A picture of a cat is displayed with 'Cute cat' as alternative text.

constraints: Use the tag with a valid src attribute.
Always provide an alt attribute for accessibility.
Add width or height to resize the image.
starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>Image Example</title>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- Add your image here -->
</body>
</html>
hints: src specifies the path to the image file.
alt provides text if the image cannot load.
Use width="300" or height="200" for size.
